org.wicketstuff.jsr303
Class PropertyValidation

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.wicket.behavior.AbstractBehavior
      org.wicketstuff.jsr303.PropertyValidation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.wicket.behavior.IBehavior, org.apache.wicket.IClusterable, org.apache.wicket.markup.html.IHeaderContributor
public class PropertyValidation
extends org.apache.wicket.behavior.AbstractBehavior

Behavior to be added to either a FormComponent or Form. If used on a FormComponent, it has to be bound to an AbstractPropertyModel. When used on a Form, this behavior will be added to all appropriate FormComponents.

See Also:
Serialized Form
